topic.title: Reviewers
topic.section:
The Reviewer is assigned by the Track Director to review a submission. Reviewers provide recommendations for or against submissions via online review (although some conferences opt for an email review), and can upload reviewed files for the use of the Track Director and the Author.

On Log In page, non-registered users can create an account with the conference as reviewer.

For more information, see {help_topic key="editorial.reviewersRole" text="Reviewer's Role"}.
